creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black band; ends decorated similarly with embroidered or woven radiating diamond motif in reds, pinks, white and purple; purple and red lines and white stars embroidered around three sides of diamond panels; red, and blue and white striped, edging at ends with groups of three discs embroidered in orange, purple, white, yellow and green, and red knot clusters applied to outer edges
title: Head wrap
